page.title: 10OLD ELLENBOROUGH
page.content:
NY0435 + NY0436
This is a former farming community first recorded in the 14th C.,that existed before the town of Maryport itsself.The centre consists of an old farmhouse(1681)+ 124 terraced houses varying from farming cottages of rough hewn sandstone in the vernacular style to larger Victorian houses made of dressed sandstone.There are also 5 new bungalows and houses+24 old peoples bungalows.There are 3 public houses,1 nursey school,1 supermarket,1 general shop + 1 bakers.There is a recreation groung and some open spaces created by demolition of housing,one old peoples home in a large converted Victorian detatched house and allotments.
